resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

raulcd commented on PR #13666:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13666#issuecomment-1191600948

   Could [this nightly packaging failure for java-jars](https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/7445570916?check_suite_focus=true) be related?
   ```
   Installing glib-utils
   Warning: 'glib-utils' formula is unreadable: No available formula with the name "glib-utils". Did you mean git-utils?
   Warning: No available formula with the name "glib-utils". Did you mean git-utils?
   ==>Searching for similarly named formulae...
   This similarly named formula was found:
   git-utils
   To install it, run:
     brew install git-utils
   ==>Searching for a previously deleted formula (in the last month)...
   Error: No previously deleted formula found.
   ==>Searching taps on GitHub...
   Error: No formulae found in taps.
   Installing glib-utils has failed!
   ```

kou commented on PR #13666:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13666#issuecomment-1192049294

   Yes. I'll fix this soon.
